text.xx-xx: As you have to be online to play this title, you will not be able to play the game at all after October 10, 2018.
Thank you for continuing to play ModNation.
text.en-us: Thank you for continuing to play ModNation.
text.en-gb: Thank you for continuing to play ModNation.
text.da: Tak fordi du fortsætter med at spille ModNation.
text.de: Danke, dass Sie weiterhin ModNation spielen.
text.fr: Merci de continuer à jouer à ModNation.
text.it: Grazie per aver continuato a giocare a ModNation.
text.ja: ModNationをプレイし続けてくれてありがとう。
text.nl: Bedankt dat je doorgaat met het spelen van ModNation.
text.no: Takk for at du fortsetter å spille ModNation.
text.pl: Dziękujemy za dalsze granie w ModNation.
text.pt: Obrigado por continuar a jogar ModNation.
text.ru: Спасибо, что продолжаете играть в ModNation.
text.sv: Tack för att du fortsatte spela ModNation.
